title: Cuddles Saves the Forest III
description: In this extra cute installment in the Cuddles franchise, everybody‘s favorite bear must convince lumberjacks to rethink their ways.
alt1: Cuddles speaks to a lumberjack holding a chainsaw in the forest
alt2: Cuddles and animal pals talking to the lumberjack and a young girl
alt4: All of them hug as red hearts float around them
